analysis.root_cause: The test runner operating system failed to resolve the hostname 'ai400x.ddn.local' to an IP address. This is typically due to missing DNS entries, incorrect DNS configuration on the host machine, or the required entry being absent from the local hosts file (e.g., /etc/hosts or C:\Windows\System32\drivers\etc\hosts).

similar_error_docs.root_cause: DNS cannot resolve the DDN storage hostname. Either DNS server is not configured, hostname is incorrect, or /etc/hosts file is missing entry.

analysis.solution: 1. Verify the exact IP address of the DDN storage node 'ai400x.ddn.local'. 2. On the test execution environment (the Jenkins runner machine), update the hosts file to manually map this hostname to its IP address. 3. Alternatively, ensure the DNS server configured for the test environment includes the necessary A record for 'ai400x.ddn.local'.

metadata.test_name: should measure Lustre parallel I/O scalability

metadata.error_message: java.net.UnknownHostException: exascaler.ddn.local: Name or service not known
metadata.root_cause: DNS cannot resolve the DDN storage hostname. Either DNS server is not configured, hostname is incorrect, or /etc/hosts file is missing entry.
